name: thicker
text: "Boo to that" is yet another achewoodism that has entered my vernacular.

name: delzhand
text: Mine too.

name: thunderbots
text: why would a robot ass be round if the rest of him is square.  does he roll over when he sits down?

name: primal_in_the_mane
text: WHY FIND OUT

name: hipjiverobot
text: Has Lie Bot ever sat down?

name: featurelessvoid
text: Yes, in the story arc where he became a bestselling author, Lie Bot was shown sitting down at his book signing.

name: redmange
text: And, before that, he was shown sitting down in the back seat of a car when the entire troupe was attempting to abscond to Las Vegas

name: muscles
text: You can't have a square ass, man. That don't make sense.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Robot Ass Part 2: Electric Boogaloo

name: slab64
text: A comment left by slab64 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, phthoggos, le_chien_manquee, ArthurDentLives, Magb, usversusthem, AmonRunsAmok, saucy_jack)

name: sherwood
text: because, save "boo to that", dialogue is unnecessary.  Read it again with only "boo to that"

name: mercuri0us
text: heck yeah, the ass is unpredictable.  Like, where did that come from?

name: garlic_breath
text: No way.  The hilarious dialogue is what makes it so funny.  Oh and the robot ass.

name: senseihollywood
text: looks like a slice of bread

name: homeskool
text: Because our lives aren't complete without a second helping of Lie Bot's ass.

name: jesler729
text: Oh man I brought this from 3.9 to 3.8 and now I wish I hadn't.

name: hyetal
text: I enjoy this way more than is healthy.

name: rowboat
text: I did, too. THE FIRST TIME!

name: hyetal
text: Enjoy it again for the first time!

name: charchar
text: mmm, firm.

name: mattylite
text: This one is funnier every time I read it. I wouldn't mind if it got re-run weekly. If ratings didn't stop at 5, my rating for each successive rerun would be x 1 , where x is my previous rating. Sorry for the algebra, Little Nephew.

name: mattylite
text: Damn you assetbar, x PLUS 1 .

name: mattylite
text: I'm sorry I yelled at you, Assetbar.  I'm so sorry.

name: aliiis
text: truth.

name: mugi
text: Best part:  Lyle and Teodor's speechlessness in the last panel.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I like the way  Liebot's hand is turned from panel 1 to 3

name: fineoakstructure
text: pix plz
